questions: Should I exercise regularly or never exercise at all?
Is it better to save some money or spend everything immediately?
Should I learn from my mistakes or keep repeating them?
Is it better to get enough sleep or stay sleep-deprived?
Should I drink water or only drink soda?
Is it better to have some friends or be completely isolated?
Should I brush my teeth or let them rot?
Is it better to learn new skills or refuse to learn anything?
Should I show up on time or always be hours late?
Is it better to eat vegetables sometimes or never eat any?
Should I pay my bills or ignore them completely?
Is it better to be honest with my doctor or lie about symptoms?
Should I wear a seatbelt or never wear one?
Is it better to back up important files or never back anything up?
Should I read the instructions or just guess randomly?
Is it better to apologize when wrong or never admit mistakes?
Should I listen to feedback or ignore all criticism?
Is it better to plan ahead or never think about the future?
Should I stay hydrated or avoid drinking water?
Is it better to be kind to others or be rude to everyone?
